ygData.subject: Rewrite!
ygData.msgSnippet: My bad! I was told that the Alliance had started fighting on Angel Prime and stuff like that. Forget my last post with IR in it. I misunderstood a few posts. I

From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>

My bad! I was told that the Alliance had started fighting on Angel Prime and 
stuff like that.
Forget my last post with IR in it. I misunderstood a few posts. I guess 
that's what happens when you start posting when you're board out of your 
tree.
Plus I didn't know that FZ was having other nagotiation with other bots.
This is a better post so just emit the last one.

* Iron Raptor glared out towards the battlefield, her sword in hand a ready 
for trouble.
She knew for a fact that FZ wouldn't let any of the Alliance release 
Chordate and that this was a slight waste of time. All they were doing now 
was running their collective mouths and trying to make themselves sound more 
intimidating then the other.
But she knew that the Alliance had the upper hand and the CF was getting 
closer and closer to simply falling apart just like the Ark had before it 
was repaired and sent into space. That was the last she had heard of it.
Iron Raptor sighed and leaned her weight on one leg, keeping her eyes on the 
battle and watching over everything that was done.
There was nothing she could do for Angel Prime, he had dug his own hole and 
he was adult enough to get himself out of it. She had given him the chance 
and he had ignored it. Even though she hated to admit it, she wasn't going 
to help him.
Besides, it wasn't fair to the other Maximals to just order them to go out 
there and risk getting their brains blown out just to save a bot who 
couldn't save himself. But this wasn't only her call.
Some of the Maximals behind her might be itching to fight while others were 
praying that the Alliance would just leave.
Iron Raptor looked towards Prowl for a moment before glancing over her 
shoulder towards the remainder of the Maximals.
There was nagotiations going on right now so attack was not an option, but 
simply standing here and doing nothing could get to a lot of Maximals that 
had been in a battle rage only moments before. But they would have to hold 
up. Just like her. < We wait.> she thought to Prowl. < See just what they're 
up to, then maybe make our way to the CF to either get the captives or try 
and repair some of the weapons so we stand more of a chance.>* Iron Raptor 
centered her stance.*

" We wait."
